publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2373 Gil Paterson: Rally in Support of St Margaret’s of Scotland Hospice—That the Parliament notes that there will be a rally on 17 August 2008 in George Square, Glasgow, calling for St Margaret’s of Scotland Hospice in Clydebank to retain its current status and services; urges members of the public and parliamentarians who have had relatives who benefited from the services available at the hospice to attend this rally and show their support; further urges NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to recognise that over 90,000 people have signed a petition in support of the hospice, and calls on the NHS board not to withdraw the threatened beds from St Margaret’s. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Bashir Ahmad*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Jackie Baillie*
S3M-2373 Rally in Support of St Margaret’s of Scotland Hospice (lodged on 6 August 2008) Aileen Campbell*, Jackson Carlaw*, Jamie Hepburn*
